ForecastingTypeSource.name: ForecastingTypeSource
ForecastingTypeSource.description: Represents the mapping of a forecasting source definition to a forecast type.

DeveloperName.description: The developer name of the forecasting source definition.

ForecastingSourceDefinitionId.description: The ID of the forecasting source definition.

ForecastingTypeId.description: The ID of the forecast type. Can be linked only to forecast types created in Summer â€™21 and later.

FullName.description: The full name of the forecasting type source.

Language.description: The language of the forecasting type source.

MasterLabel.description: Required. The controlling label for this forecasting type source.

Metadata.description: The metadata of the forecasting source definition.

ParentSourceDefinitionId.description: For forecast types not based on the Opportunity object and not based on a custom measure, this value represents the ID of the parent ForecastingSourceDefinition of the linked ForecastingSourceDefinition.

RelationField.description: Represents the field that links the source objects of the parent ForecastingSourceDefinition to the child ForecastingSourceDefinition.

SourceGroup.description: Required. Represents a grouping of forecast type source definitions.
